settings.title: Unlock your hair's full potential with a custom hair growth plan.

settings.short_info: Specifically crafted to bring life back to dry and dull strands, this shampoo is a hydration hero. Infused with nourishing and natural ingredients, it deeply moisturizes the scalp while gently cleansing.

Enriched with hydrating natural ingredients, it penetrates deeply to nourish each strand, leaving hair feeling silky and lustrous. Ideal for all hair types, this luxurious conditioner helps to detangle, reduce frizz, and promote a healthy, vibrant mane.

Formulated with a blend of essential nutrients and natural oils, it penetrates deeply to nourish the scalp and strengthen hair from root to tip. Ideal for damaged or over-processed hair, this oil works to improve elasticity, enhance shine, and soothe dryness.

Made from natural keratin fibers, it seamlessly blends with your existing hair to create a fuller, denser appearance. Perfect for daily use, these fibers are resistant to wind and rain, ensuring your hair looks thick and complete throughout the day. Easy to apply and available in a range of colors, the Keratin Fiber Hair is the quick fix for a confident, fuller hair look.

settings.title: Great days start with great hair.
settings.add_text: Unlock your hair's full potential with science-backed formulas that are gentle enough for everyday use.

settings.title: Ditch the Damage, Embrace Results: The Reset & Protect Duo for Flawless Hair.

settings.add_text: I started using Dr. Yates Thickening Shampoo, Serum and Thickening Fibers. I finally feel normal again!  One of my coworkers actually commented that my hair looked really good the other day.
settings.name: Carroll

settings.title: Meet Dr. William Yates
settings.add_text:
Dr. Yates is a visionary entrepreneur and internationally renowned hair surgeon who turned personal challenges into a mission for positive change. 

Witnessing the emotional impact of hair loss on cancer patients firsthand, Dr. Yates was driven to develop an innovative haircare approach that empower individuals to reclaim their confidence.

His commitment to using pure ingredients and scientific innovation reflects a profound dedication to enhancing both hair health and self-esteem.
